divs: Sighting Detailsi was taken a vacation to daytona beach whit my girfriend soon we arrived to place or stoff inside the hotel we notice a big light ball in sky and then turning small and disapear i immidiately took a picture of the activity notice later that this light was making a circle before vanish in the sky.this objet at close look is like a ball with a shadow on the bottom making a verry wire manuvior on the sky. i will send you by e-mail copy of this fenomenon encounter in florida penhandle.
